Uses of Class
agents.org.apache.commons.math.MathException

  • Packages that use MathException 
    Package Description
    agents.org.apache.commons.math
    Common classes used throughout the commons-math library.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.analysis.interpolation
    Univariate real functions interpolation algorithms.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.distribution
    Implementations of common discrete and continuous distributions.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.estimation
    This package provided classes to solve estimation problems, it is deprecated since 2.0.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.fraction
    Fraction number type and fraction number formatting.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.geometry
    This package provides basic 3D geometry components.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.linear
    Linear algebra support.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.ode
    This package provides classes to solve Ordinary Differential Equations problems.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.ode.events
    This package provides classes to handle discrete events occurring during Ordinary Differential Equations integration.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization
    This package provides common interfaces for the optimization algorithms provided in sub-packages.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization.linear
    This package provides optimization algorithms for linear constrained problems.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.random
    Random number and random data generators.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.special
    Implementations of special functions such as Beta and Gamma.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.correlation
    Correlations/Covariance computations.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.inference
    Classes providing hypothesis testing and confidence interval construction.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.stat.regression
    Statistical routines involving multivariate data.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.util
    Convenience routines and common data structures used throughout the commons-math library.

    • Uses of MathException in agents.org.apache.commons.math

      Subclasses of MathException in agents.org.apache.commons.math 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArgumentOutsideDomainException
      Error thrown when a method is called with an out of bounds argument.
      class  ConvergenceException
      Error thrown when a numerical computation can not be performed because the numerical result failed to converge to a finite value.
      class  DimensionMismatchException
      Deprecated. 
      in 2.2 (to be removed in 3.0). Please use its equivalent from package agents.org.apache.commons.math.exception.
      class  DuplicateSampleAbscissaException
      Exception thrown when a sample contains several entries at the same abscissa.
      class  FunctionEvaluationException
      Exception thrown when an error occurs evaluating a function.
      class  MathConfigurationException
      Signals a configuration problem with any of the factory methods.
      class  MaxEvaluationsExceededException
      Error thrown when a numerical computation exceeds its allowed number of functions evaluations.
      class  MaxIterationsExceededException
      Error thrown when a numerical computation exceeds its allowed number of iterations.
